        public void show()
        Called when this becomes the active screen in a Game. Set up InputMultiplexer here, in case screen is reactivated at a later time.
        Specified by:
        show in interface com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

      • hide

        public void hide()
        Called when this is no longer the active screen in a Game. Screen class and Stages no longer process input. Other InputProcessors must be removed manually.
        Specified by:
        hide in interface com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
